Module jGame
Package jGame.core.ui.hud

Class UIHudSliderElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudElement
      • jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudSliderElement
  • public class UIHudSliderElement
extends UIHudElement
    Class responsible for creating a horizontal slider, in order to get a value in a certain range. Minimum and maximum values can be anything (inside the restrictions of the int data type (see Integer.MAX_VALUE and Integer.MIN_VALUE), as long as the minimum value is below the maximum.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Nuno Pereira

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  UIHudSliderElement.SliderCallback
      Functional interface representing a callback to be executed when the value of the slider changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UIHudSliderElement

        public UIHudSliderElement()

      • UIHudSliderElement

        public UIHudSliderElement​(int x,
                          int y,
                          int minValue,
                          int maxValue)
        Creates a UIHudSliderElement in the given x and y position and with the given minimum and maximum values. This elements value is set to the minimum value.
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal position in which to render this element
        y - the vertical position in which to render this element
        minValue - the minimum value this slider can give
        maxValue - the maximum value this slider can give
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • UIHudSliderElement

        public UIHudSliderElement​(int x,
                          int y,
                          int minValue,
                          int maxValue,
                          int constraintType,
                          int[] constraintSpecs)
        Creates a UIHudSliderElement in the given x and y position and with the given minimum and maximum values, using the given constraints. This elements value is set to the minimum value.
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal position in which to render this element
        y - the vertical position in which to render this element
        minValue - the minimum value this slider can give
        maxValue - the maximum value this slider can give
        constraintType - the type of constraints to apply to this element
        constraintSpecs - the specific values to apply when constraining the element, or null if not needed
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        Constraints

      • UIHudSliderElement

        public UIHudSliderElement​(int x,
                          int y,
                          int minValue,
                          int maxValue,
                          int startValue)
        Creates a UIHudSliderElement in the given x and y position and with the given minimum, maximum and start values.
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal position in which to render this element
        y - the vertical position in which to render this element
        minValue - the minimum value this slider can give
        maxValue - the maximum value this slider can give
        startValue - the start value of this slider
        Since:
        1.2.0
